td.content: s:a female registrar aged 29 years presents with 6 days history of Body Aches. she states she has never smoked a cigarette in her life denies any alcohol use o:Height 166 cm, Weight 91.8 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 69, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 16, B burgdorferi IgM CSF positive a:Lyme Disease p:administered ceftriaxone - 2 grams daily x 7 days, performed B burgdorferi IgM CSF, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
